Class MailResources

java.lang.Object
br.com.concepting.framework.caching.CachedObject<XmlNode>
br.com.concepting.framework.resources.BaseResources<XmlNode>
br.com.concepting.framework.mail.resources.MailResources
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class MailResources extends BaseResources<XmlNode>
Class responsible to store the mail resources.
